channel.title: Server Help
channel.description:
I have a tscape source and the server works fine except for a couple things.
1. Doors wont open... 2. Fishing doesnt work 3. No skillcapes 4. would like to have Npc turn to attack player 5. when some npcs die they just auto respawn with no drops (as if it never died)
these are just a few. Any help is appreciated

item.title: Server Help
item.dc:creator: @Absentnos Absentnos
item.description:
@Absentnos wrote:

Alright. Could you elaborate on your answer to #1 and #2?
I can probably figure out the others.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Help
item.dc:creator: @_MOAD `MOAD
item.description:
@_MOAD wrote:

To #1: replace object method.
To #2: Either NPC click packets, or object switch statement/if-statement
To #3: Client-sided, if your client supports it create a unique way to release them.
To #4: I’m not very good with NPC’s.
To #5: autospawn.cfg file for their respawn.

Read full topic
